devdoc.details: A contract with a collection of methods for testing certain edge cases related to gas. This is primarily used by the bundler to verify that its UserOperation gas estimates are working.

recursiveCall(uint8,uint8).details: This method allows you to run a recursive call where each nested call uses more gas than its parent.

params.count: Specifies a countdown that decrements by 1 at each call.
params.depth: Specifies the number of recursive calls to make.

returns._0: sum Specifies the total writes made to the store.

devdoc.title: TestGas
